headline.main: SINKING QUICKENS CONGRESS ACTION; Members' Comment Indicates Drastic Neutrality Law Revision Is Expedited

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 31 -- The first reaction in the capital to the sinking of the Reuben James was that it would hasten revision of the Neutrality Act.
abstract: Wash sees sinking hastening ship arming sec revision
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 31 -- The first reaction in the capital to the sinking of the Reuben James was that it would hasten revision of the Neutrality Act....
